content:
Arising out of discussions with @Vlad Korobov and users about Recent topics, I filed #22189 for creating an "inbox"-style view in the webapp, similar to the view we have in mobile.

I found it easiest to write this up as an issue to kick off the discussion, but ideas/feedback/etc. are definitely appreciated!

Yeah, I think this has always vaguely been within our plans when we worked on adding "Recent topics", and because we already have the data plumbing for it (since it's the same data presented in the left sidebar), it's probably a lot easier to build than it might seem. (Still not a small project, but not a huge one either).
